content.question:
You will participate in a simulated exchange of text-chat messages. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

You will have a conversation with Misaki Kawakami, an exchange student who will be staying in your home, about her upcoming visit. Type your response in the target language.

Respond.

今度、そちらで生活することで、いろいろ聞きたいことがあるんだけど、いいかな？

frqParts.text:
You will participate in a simulated exchange of text-chat messages. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

You will have a conversation with Misaki Kawakami, an exchange student who will be staying in your home, about her upcoming visit. Type your response in the target language.

Respond.

今度、そちらで生活することで、いろいろ聞きたいことがあるんだけど、いいかな？

Give at least two examples.

まず、食事についてだけど、いつもどんなものを食べているの？

Give your opinion.

きらいな食べ物があったら、どうしたらいいと思う？

Give your advice.

そちらに行くのは、9月なんだけど、どんな服を持って行ったらいいかな？

Respond.

学校に行く一日のスケジュールを、かんたんに教えてくれるかな？

Ask a specific question.

しばらくいっしょに生活することになるけど、何か私に聞きたいことはある？

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
